realm.name: WebAdmin
realm.description: Web admin of company in clients portal

passwordPolicy: upperCase(1) and lowerCase(1) and digits(1) and notUsername(undefined) and length(8) and passwordHistory(5) and hashAlgorithm(pbkdf2-sha256) and hashIterations(27500) and specialChars(0)

clientScopes.name: web-origins
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add allowed web origins to the access token

clientScopes.name: roles
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add user roles to the access token

identityProviderMappers.name: Automatic assigned role Realm ReadOnly Admin

authenticationFlows.description: Handle what to do if there is existing account with same email/username like authenticated identity provider
Used by Docker clients to authenticate against the IDP
Actions taken after first broker login with identity provider account, which is not yet linked to any Keycloak account
Username, password, otp and other auth forms.
An authentication flow based on challenge-response HTTP Authentication Schemes
Reset credentials for a user if they forgot their password or something
